experience.title: Machine Learning
experience.description: Objective: To analyze the Excitation-Emission Matrix dataset for bacteria detection using machine learning techniques‚Ä¢ Standardized the dataset and used LabelEncoder for the target variable and gridSearchCV for hyperparameter tuning of the model‚Ä¢ Achieved an accuracy of 91.5% in bacteria classification by applying models like random forest, decision tree, and logistic regression‚Ä¢ Applied VGG-19 along with data augmentation on the image dataset generated by Spectramax M5 and achieved an accuracy of 82%
experience.description_html: Objective: To analyze the Excitation-Emission Matrix dataset for bacteria detection using machine learning techniques‚Ä¢ Standardized the dataset and used LabelEncoder for the target variable and gridSearchCV for hyperparameter tuning of the model‚Ä¢ Achieved an accuracy of 91.5% in bacteria classification by applying models like random forest, decision tree, and logistic regression‚Ä¢ Applied VGG-19 along with data augmentation on the image dataset generated by Spectramax M5 and achieved an accuracy of 82%
